# representedElementKind

**Instance Property**

A string that identifies the type of item.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var representedElementKind: String? { get }
```

## Identifying the item

- **name**: The name of the item.
- **representedElementCategory**: A category that identifies the item, such as decoration or supplementary view.

items.description: A category that identifies the item, such as decoration or supplementary view.
items.name: representedElementCategory
